Literature Review: Diagnostic classification tests have become increasingly popular in educational and psychological measurement due to their ability to assess examinees' discrete mastery status on a set of skills or attributes. This review aims to discuss the statistical applications of cognitive diagnostic testing, its connections to machine learning, and the related challenges and future extensions.
